data.name: ExceptionConnectionStringNodeNotFound
data.value: The connection string node named {0} could not be found for the instance {1}. Please make sure that all connection string nodes are loaded before the instance and check that the name exists.
data.comment: Exception MessagesMessage when connection string node not found for instance. Parameters: 0 - connectionString (string), 1 - instanceName (string)

data.name: ExceptionInstanceNodeNotFound
data.value: The instance node named {0} could not be found for the database settings. Please make sure that all instance nodes are loaded before the database settings checks for the instance and check that the name exists.
data.comment: Message when instance node not found for database settings. Parameters: 0 - instanceName (string)

data.name: ExceptionDatabaseTypeNodeNotFound
data.value: The database type node named {0} could not be found for the instance {1}. Please make sure that all database type nodes are loaded before the instance and check that the name exists.
data.comment: Message when database type node not found for instance. Parameters: 0 - typeName (string), 1 - instanceName (string)
